name: George Soros
description:
Did you see, they did it! Those suckers at Jew or Not Jew finally did it! They profiled George Soros! Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy!

George Soros was born Gyorgy Schwartz to a Jewish family in Budapest. When Nazis occupied Hungary, he was lucky to survive the Holocaust.

The truth will finally come out! The true power of Soros will be revealed!

After World War II, Soros emigrated to England, where he began a financial career that eventually made him into a billionaire.

Oh, they are getting there! All that money, all that money!

He has donated billions of dollars to numerous philanthropic causes. In the 1980s, his money helped support the rise of democracy throughout Eastern Europe, including in is native Hungary. This played a role in communism's eventual downfall.

They said it: Soros topples governments! Oh, those Jews finally spoke the truth!

Soros' Open Society Foundation strives to advance justice, education, public health and independent media.

Justice! Education! Public Health! Independent Media! These are the four horsemen of the apocalypse, and Soros must be the antichrist!

Unfortunately, this world is full of idiots who prop up Soros as some kind of a left-wing boogeyman. Some of them even read this website...
